verses.verse: The angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me came again, <S%H7725><s%> and wakened <S%H5782><s%> me, <S%H376><s%> as a man who is wakened <S%H5782><s%> out of his sleep. <S%H8142><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> "What do you see?" I said, <S%H559><s%> "I have seen, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H4501><s%> a lampstand all of gold, <S%H2091><s%> with its bowl <S%H1531><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of it, <S%H7651><s%> and its seven lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereon; <S%H7651><s%> there are seven pipes <S%H4166><s%> to each of the <S%H7651><s%> lamps, <S%H5216><s%> which are on the top of it; <S%H7218><s%>
and two <S%H8147><s%> olive trees <S%H2132><s%> by it, <S%H259><s%> one on the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the bowl, <S%H1543><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on the left side of it. <S%H8040><s%>"
I answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "What are these, <S%H113><s%> my lord?"
Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me answered <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H3045><s%> "Don't you know what these are? <S%H559><s%>" I said, "No, <S%H113><s%> my lord."

Then he answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "This is the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H2428><s%> 'Not by might, nor by power, <S%H3581><s%> but by my Spirit, <S%H7307><s%>' says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

Who are you, <S%H1419><s%> great mountain? <S%H2022><s%> Before <S%H6440><s%> Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> you are a plain; <S%H4334><s%> and he will bring out <S%H3318><s%> the capstone <S%H68><s%> with shouts of <S%H2580><s%> 'Grace, grace, <S%H2580><s%> to it!'"
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

"The hands <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> have laid the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of this house. <S%H1004><s%> His hands <S%H3027><s%> shall also finish <S%H1214><s%> it; <S%H3045><s%> and you will know that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has sent me to you. <S%H7971><s%>

Indeed, <S%H936><s%> who despises the day <S%H3117><s%> of small things? <S%H6996><s%> For these seven shall rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> and shall see <S%H7200><s%> the plumb <S%H68><s%> line in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel. <S%H2216><s%> These <S%H7651><s%> are the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which run back and forth <S%H7751><s%> through the whole earth. <S%H776><s%>"
Then I asked <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H8147><s%> "What are these two olive trees <S%H2132><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> and on the left side of it? <S%H8040><s%>"

I asked <S%H559><s%> him the second <S%H8145><s%> time, <S%H8147><s%> "What are these two olive <S%H2132><s%> branches, <S%H7641><s%> which are beside <S%H3027><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> spouts, <S%H6804><s%> that pour <S%H7324><s%> the golden oil out of themselves? <S%H2091><s%>"
He answered <S%H559><s%> me, <S%H3045><s%> "Don't you know what these are? <S%H559><s%>" I said, "No, <S%H113><s%> my lord."
Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "These are the two <S%H8147><s%> anointed <S%H3323><s%> ones <S%H1121><s%> who stand <S%H5975><s%> by the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole earth. <S%H776><s%>"
